thread.title: PA Preps/Big 33 Senior Spotlight: Khaleke Hudson
thread.title_full: PA Preps/Big 33 Senior Spotlight: Khaleke Hudson

title: PA Preps/Big 33 Senior Spotlight: Khaleke Hudson
text:
PA Preps/Big 33 Senior Spotlight: Khaleke Hudson Ed O'Brien PaPreps.com Recruiting Analyst PA PREPS and The Big 33 have partnered up to give even more exposure to football players here in the state of Pennsylvania. PA PREPS/ Big 33 will start the "PA PREPS/Big 33 Senior Prospect Watch" for the senior class (2016) up until signing day. Note: this has NO BEARING WHATSOEVER ON WHO GETS PICKED FOR THE BIG 33 GAME. District 7 KHALEKE HUDSON McKeesport High School - 5'11", 204 lbs. PA PREPS/BIG 33 Senior Prospect to Watch: Khaleke Hudson is one of the best two-way players in the Class of 2016His versatility as a football player is one of the main reasons why he has over 25-plus offers righ now. He narrowed his list down several months ago with Penn State and Pittsburgh among the schools that made the final cut.Despite sharing carries with other running backs on his team, Hudson has rushed 76 times for 768 yards and 13 touchdowns. On the defensive side of the ball, Hudson has 35 tackles (20 solo) on the season. Hudson is currently rated as a four-star athlete. Hudson is slated to play in the Semper-Fi All-American game this upcoming January. Check out his 2016 season highlights below. 
Ed O'Brien
